entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023
